```{r setup}
library(cbsccb)
library(dplyr) # not needed but used for example
```

# Introduction

```{r}
catalogs <- ccb_get_catalogs() 
catalogs %>% 
  select(Identifier, Title)
```


```{r}
datasets <- ccb_get_datasets()
datasets %>% 
  select(Identifier, Title) %>% 
  head(2)
```

```{r}
meta <- ccb_get_metadata("84120NED")
ls.str(meta)
```

```{r}
data <- ccb_get_data("84120NED")
data %>% 
  select(-Id, -ValueAttribute) %>% 
  head(5)
```


```{r}
data <- ccb_get_data("84120NED")

data %>% 
  select(-Id, -ValueAttribute) %>%
  ccb_add_labels() %>% 
  head(5) 
```

```{r}
data <- ccb_get_data("84120NED")

data %>% 
  select(-Id, -ValueAttribute) %>%
  ccb_add_date_column() %>% 
  head(5) 

library(tidyr)
data %>% 
  ccb_add_labels() %>% 
  select(ends_with("Label"), Value) %>% 
  spread(MeasureLabel, Value) %>% 
  head()
```

```{r}
meta <- ccb_get_metadata("84120NED")
data <- ccb_get_data("84120NED")
data %>% 
  select(-Id, -ValueAttribute) %>%
  ccb_add_unit() %>% 
  head(5) 
```
